citations.narrative:
The enclosure for the two wolves has standing water and mud and provides no dry area for the animals. There are no
areas in the enclosure in which the animals can stand, sit, or move around in without being in the water/mud. In addition,
the bedding in the wolves' shelter is damp. Standing water and muddy conditions without access to a dry area can cause
discomfort, thus affecting the health and welfare of the animals.
A suitable method shall be provided to rapidly eliminate excess water. The animals must have access to a dry area in the
enclosure. Corrected during the inspection.
A complete routine inspection was conducted starting on 1-MAR-2024. This inspection report is limited to the Direct non-
compliance identified during that inspection. An additional inspection report will be delivered with the other issues
identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
Ashley Alger
Gustavo Soberano, Assistant Director n

narrative:
3.127(c)  Direct
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The enclosure for the two wolves has standing water and mud and provides no dry area for the animals. There are no 
areas in the enclosure in which the animals can stand, sit, or move around in without being in the water/mud. In addition, 
the bedding in the wolves' shelter is damp. Standing water and muddy conditions without access to a dry area can cause 
discomfort, thus affecting the health and welfare of the animals.  
 
A suitable method shall be provided to rapidly eliminate excess water. The animals must have access to a dry area in the 
enclosure. Corrected during the inspection. 
 
 
A complete routine inspection was conducted starting on 1-MAR-2024. This inspection report is limited to the Direct non-
compliance identified during that inspection. An additional inspection report will be delivered with the other issues 
identified during this inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Ashley Alger 
Gustavo Soberano, Assistant Director n

species.common: GRAY WOLF / GREY WOLF / TIMBER WOLF
